title: Connection Issues....
body: Am I the only one having this?

replies.body: im stuck in champ select. we havent even picked our characters and the client wants me to believe the game is about to start...

Riot updated their [status site](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na) with the following information:
> **Network Operations — 10 minutes ago**
> We have have temporarily disabled all matchmaking queues while we work to address the issue.
> **Network Operations — 14 minutes ago**
> We have temporarily disabled Ranked Matchmaking Queues due to a known problem.

So it looks like it's everyone right now.
Client wont let me log in now.... Had problems with chat dropping me before.

Screen froze at champ select when timer finished countdown.  Series or not, paranoia drove me to restart client.  Couldn't connect.

Finally reconnected, still trying to "reconnect"  ---- I'm at the loading screen of game.

Ranked game - Series.  Unfortunate...

Anyone else?

im having it too..

EDIT: wouldn't let me relog, finally went in and my game was over. It was ranked too, thanks riot
I have SO MUCH packet loss AND buffering {{champion:32}}
Me and my friend open up the launcher and we click start and then nothing happens at all{{champion:32}}
just lost a ranked because server problems... we were stuck in champ select for about 10min. then not all of my team connected :( was hoping it would be a lose prevented... sadly it wasn't.
It wont let me log in at all either. o-o  I think they are just trying to fix things, my friend that has been able to log on said all the queues are disabled.  We just have to wait I suppose. *shrug*
Client crashed after a win but was able to login, can't que though.

Yea im not sure whats going on but my login q is jumping from 1 hour to 2 and the drops to 1:55. check this out ok guys. 

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na
Not just you, client is freaking out over here too :)
